AT-M: My passion for programming started in childhood, when I created game servers. Though I didn't realize it back then, coding has always been my true calling. In 2024, after exploring other fields, I chose to fully dedicate myself to software development.I'm driven by the challenge of finding clean, efficient solutions and learning something new every day.
Skills-Message: Experienced in JavaScript and Angular, I enjoy building dynamic and responsive user interfaces. Passionate about learning, I’m always exploring new front-end tools and frameworks to stay current and deliver efficient, modern web applications that scale well.
Skills-Future: Also, I'm interested in diving into:
Projects-Message: Explore my projects — crafted with responsive design, intuitive interfaces, and clean, efficient code. Click through and see them in action!

join.description: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
join.implementation: I worked for one month on this project as part of a 3-person team. It was a new and challenging experience to collaborate closely with others, but also very rewarding. We used Jira to manage tasks and track our progress, which helped keep the workflow organized and efficient. This project taught me a lot about teamwork, communication, and working within a structured development process.

elPolloLoco.description: Jump, run and throw game based on object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and tabasco salsa to fight against the crazy hen.
elPolloLoco.implementation: This was my first game developed using JavaScript. It’s a platformer where the main character, Pepe, collects coins and Tabasco salsa to fight a crazy hen. I used the HTML5 canvas for rendering and followed an object-oriented programming (OOP) approach using classes and objects. Through this project, I learned the basics of game development, including animation, collision detection, and structuring code with OOP. It inspired me to continue learning and eventually build more complex games in the future.

dabubble.description: This App is a Slack Clone App. It revolutionizes team communication and collaboration with its intuitive interface, real-time messaging, and robust channel organization.
dabubble.implementation: Next, I will build DaBubble, a chat app similar to Slack. This project will help me develop skills in real-time communication, user authentication, and collaborative features, improving my full-stack development abilities.

Footer-Message: Feel free to contact me if you are looking for a dedicated web developer. With my expertise and willingness to learn, I aim to support your team effectively. I look forward to applying my skills to new projects and achieving goals together. Let’s discuss how I can add value for you.

LegalNotice.Verantwortlich: Responsible for the content according to § 55 Abs. 2 RStV
LegalNotice.HaftungsausschlussMessage: Despite careful content control, we assume no liability for the content of external links. The operators of the linked pages are solely responsible for their content.
LegalNotice.UrheberrechtMessage: The content and works created by the site operator on these pages are subject to German copyright law. Duplication, editing, distribution, and any kind of use beyond the limits of copyright require the written consent of the respective author or creator.

Datenschutzerklarung.Title: Privacy Policy
Datenschutzerklarung.1Message: This privacy policy informs you about how personal data is processed on this website. Personal data is any information by which you can be personally identified.
Datenschutzerklarung.3Message:
Server Log Files
The provider of these pages automatically collects and stores information in so-called server log files, which your browser automatically transmits.
These include:
Datenschutzerklarung.3MessageList:
Browser type and browser version
Operating system used
Referrer URL
Hostname of the accessing computer
Time of the server request
IP address
Datenschutzerklarung.3CoockiesMessage: This website only uses technically necessary cookies. No analysis or tracking is performed through cookies.
Datenschutzerklarung.4Message: This site uses SSL or TLS encryption for security reasons and to protect the transmission of confidential content.
Datenschutzerklarung.5Message: You have the right at any time to:
Datenschutzerklarung.5MessageRightsList:
- Right to access your stored data (Art. 15 GDPR)
- Correction (Art. 16 GDPR)
- Deletion (Art. 17 GDPR)
- Restriction of processing (Art. 18 GDPR)
- Data portability (Art. 20 GDPR)
- Objection to processing (Art. 21 GDPR)
Datenschutzerklarung.5MessageKontakt: Please contact the address mentioned above for this purpose.
Datenschutzerklarung.6Message: In the event of data protection violations, you have the right to lodge a complaint with the competent supervisory authority:
Datenschutzerklarung.7Message: This website does not use any analytics or tracking tools like Google Analytics or external services like Google Fonts.
